titleStmt.title: An ordinance for alteration of several names and forms heretofore used in courts, writs, grants, patents, commissions, &c. and setling of proceedings in courts of law, justice and equity, within the Commonwealth of England, Scotland, and Ireland, according to the present government.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills, Printer to His Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
